mapper.select: select * from timePrice where cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} and filmType=#{filmType} and eTime = ( select min(eTime) from timePrice where cinemaNum= #{cinemaNum} and filmType=#{filmType} and time(#{time}) <= eTime)
select min(eTime) as morning,max(eTime) as night,filmType from timePrice where cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} and eTime <= '24:01:00' group by filmType order by filmType
select * from timePrice where cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} order by filmType
select filmType from timePrice where cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} group by filmType
select * from timePrice where cinemaNum = #{cinemaNum} and filmType = #{filmType}
mapper.delete: delete from timePrice where cinemaNum=#{cinemaNum} and filmType=#{filmType}
